nodes.text: R-3DO was a protocol droid working at the Resistance base on D'Qar. The red-colored droid monitored the Resistance's network of spy droids. R-3DO was present at an assembly of Resistance members watching the Millennium Falcon take off with Rey at the controls, leaving to find Luke Skywalker.

R-3DO first appeared as an unnamed background character in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The character was first named when released as an action figure in Disney Parks' Droid Factory toy line, as an exclusive to Star Wars Celebration Orlando in 2017.
